item.title: Azure Monitor MindMap
item.author: Author
item.description: I created this Azure Monitor MindMap last year to get a better Overview over Azure Monitor. I’ve created it based on the Azure Monitor Documentation. Somethings may be outdated today -> you can find the Microsoft Docs to that topic here: Azure Monitor PreviewAzur Monitor MindMap " Preview

item.title: MindMap Hybrid Identity with Azure AD - AD Connect
item.author: Author
item.description: You can find the official documentation from Microsoft to that topic here: Microsoft Docs - Hybrid Identity In this MindMap you can see the different Authentication and Single Sign On Methods which are available. Previewhybrididentity-AzureAD-Mindmap " Preview
